author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

Fix a couple of (rather trivial) issues pointed out by the static analyzer 

- Remove a dead initialization in RecoLocalCalo/Castor/src/CastorTowerProducer.cc
- Add missing initialization in  RecoMuon/DetLayers/src/MuonGEMDetLayerGeometryBuilder.cc


#### PR validation:

It builds
title: Fix a couple of sparse issues in reco pointed out by the static analyzer
